ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

domain.description:
The "domain" for the error.  If empty, it is an EDA
core error.  Alternatively it can be an EDA application
"apiVersion" value (e.g. interfaces.eda.nokia.com/v1alpha1)
indicating that the error is specific to that application.
The domain gives the receiver information that they can use
to help them interpret the "internal" error code value, or
to find an internationalization translation for the message.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.nats.v1alpha1.ClusterExpor.description: ClusterExport is the Schema for the clusterexports API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to nats.eda.nokia.com/v1alpha1
The kind must be set to ClusterExport

spec.description: ClusterExportSpec defines the desired state of ClusterExport

description.description: A short description of the export rules.
description.title: Description

destinations.description: List of NATS cluster destination where metrics must be exported.

subjectFromJsPath.description: If true, the subject name is based on the received JsPath.
subjectFromJsPath.title: Subject From JsPath

subjectPrefix.description: A prefix to be appended to the subject in case it's based on the received JsPath.
subjectPrefix.title: Subject Prefix

destinations.title: Destinations

enabled.description: Specifies if the Export rules are enabled or not.
enabled.title: Enabled

exports.description: Define data sources to be exported to a NATS cluster.

exclude.description: List of Alarm types to exclude.
exclude.title: Exclude

include.description: List of Alarm types to include. Set it to '*' for all.
include.title: Include

namespaces.description: List of namespaces to export alarms from.
namespaces.title: Namespaces

query.description: Defines a custom query as export source

fields.description:
Fields to export from the EDB table set in `spec.query.path`.
Exports all fields if not specified.
fields.title: Fields

includeTimestamps.description: Include the export timestamp in the published message.
includeTimestamps.title: Include Timestamps

path.description:
The EDB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'.
Should NOT include the namespace element.
path.title: Path

period.description: Export period in seconds. Applicable if mode is set to 'periodic' or 'both'.
period.title: Period

where.description: A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.
where.title: Where

query.title: Query

exports.title: Exports

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ClusterExportStatus defines the observed state of ClusterExport
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.nats.v1alpha1.ClusterExpor.description: ClusterExportList is a list of clusterexports

Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

credentialsSecretName.description: NATS Credentials. A secret name with a 'username' and 'password' keys.

maxPendingAcks.description: The maximum outstanding async publishes that can be inflight at one time

maxWait.description: The maximum time (in seconds) a sync publisher waits for an acknowledgment.
maxWait.title: Max ack wait time

caFile.description: Path to a certificate authority file.
caFile.title: CA File

skipVerify.description: If true the client will not verify the server's certificate.
skipVerify.title: Skip Verify

type.title: Type

connected.title: Connected

error.title: Error

lastChecked.description: Last time the connection was checked

delete.description:
Delete all instances of ClusterExport.  If ClusterExport is a namespaced resource, all instances in all namespaces will
be deleted, and this is restricted to users with the system-administrator role.
If a non-namespaced ClusterExport, it deletes all instances of that non-namespaced resource.

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the set of CRs deleted based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector
